name: crawler
description: a go at a web crawler!

scripts.start: npm run build && node build/index.js crawler
scripts.start:crawl: npm run build && DEBUG=crawler,crawler:work,page,storage node --inspect build/index.js
scripts.start:indices: npm run build && DEBUG=indices node --inspect build/index.js updateIndices
scripts.start:images: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node --inspect build/index.js collectImages
scripts.start:text: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node --inspect build/index.js collectText

author: Joe D'Alessandro
